title: Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de 2-kai Kougeki no Okaasan wa Suki desu ka?
original_name: 通常攻撃が全体攻撃で二回攻撃のお母さんは好きですか？
sinopse: When Mamato Oosuki is given the opportunity to go to a fantasy world, he jumps on it. When he arrives, it turns out it's a game and his doting mother will be playing with him.
